problems.title: Factorial
problems.description:
Calculate the factorial of a number N.

Input: 5
Output: 120
problems.explanation: Factorial of N (N!) is the product of all positive integers from 1 to N.

starter_codes.python:
import math
print(math.factorial(int(input())))

problems.title: GCD of Two Numbers
problems.description: Find the Greatest Common Divisor (GCD) of two integers a and b.
problems.explanation: Use the Euclidean algorithm: `gcd(a, b)` is `gcd(b, a % b)` until `b` becomes 0.

starter_codes.python:
import math
a, b = map(int, input().split())
print(math.gcd(a, b))

problems.title: Prime Factorization
problems.description:
Print all prime factors of a given number N in increasing order, separated by spaces.

Input: 12
Output: 2 2 3

starter_codes.python:
n = int(input())
# Print prime factors

problems.title: LCM of Two Numbers
problems.description:
Find the Least Common Multiple (LCM) of two integers a and b.
Hint: LCM(a, b) = (a * b) / GCD(a, b)

starter_codes.python:
import math
a, b = map(int, input().split())
print((a * b) // math.gcd(a, b))

problems.title: Power Function
problems.description: Calculate a raised to the power of b (a^b). Both a and b are integers.

starter_codes.python:
a, b = map(int, input().split())
print(a ** b)

problems.title: Count Digits
problems.description: Count the number of digits in a given integer N.

starter_codes.python: print(len(str(int(input()))))

problems.title: Reverse Number
problems.description: Reverse the digits of a given integer N.

starter_codes.python:
n = int(input())
print(int(str(n)[::-1]))

problems.title: Check Prime
problems.description: Check if a number N is prime. Output 1 for Yes, 0 for No.

problems.title: Nth Fibonacci Number
problems.description: Find the Nth Fibonacci number (0-indexed). F(0)=0, F(1)=1.

problems.title: Sum of Digits
problems.description: Calculate the sum of digits of a given integer N.

starter_codes.python:
n = int(input())
print(sum(int(d) for d in str(abs(n))))

problems.title: Palindrome Number
problems.description: Check if integer N is a palindrome. Output 1 for Yes, 0 for No.

starter_codes.python:
s = input()
print(1 if s == s[::-1] else 0)

problems.title: Armstrong Number
problems.description: Check if N is an Armstrong number (sum of cubes of digits equals N for 3-digit numbers). Output 1 for Yes, 0 for No.

starter_codes.python:
n = int(input())
s = sum(int(d)**3 for d in str(n))
print(1 if s == n else 0)

problems.title: Perfect Number
problems.description: Check if N is a perfect number (sum of divisors excluding N equals N). Output 1/0.

starter_codes.python:
n = int(input())
s = sum(i for i in range(1, n) if n % i == 0)
print(1 if s == n else 0)

problems.title: Leap Year
problems.description: Check if a year Y is a leap year. Output 1 for Yes, 0 for No.

starter_codes.python:
y = int(input())
print(1 if (y % 4 == 0 and y % 100 != 0) or (y % 400 == 0) else 0)

problems.title: Binomial Coefficient
problems.description: Calculate nCr = n! / (r! * (n-r)!). Input n and r.

starter_codes.python:
import math
n, r = map(int, input().split())
print(math.comb(n, r))

problems.title: Sum of Natural Numbers
problems.description: Calculate sum of first N natural numbers.

starter_codes.python:
n = int(input())
print(n * (n + 1) // 2)

problems.title: Factors of a Number
problems.description: Print all factors of N in increasing order, separated by space.

problems.title: Largest Prime Factor
problems.description: Find the largest prime factor of a number N.

problems.title: Area of Circle
problems.description: Calculate area of a circle given radius R. Use PI = 3.14. Output integer part.

starter_codes.python:
r = float(input())
print(int(3.14 * r * r))

problems.title: Perimeter of Rectangle
problems.description: Calculate perimeter of a rectangle given length L and width W.

starter_codes.python:
l, w = map(int, input().split())
print(2 * (l + w))

problems.title: Simple Interest
problems.description: Calculate Simple Interest given P, R, T. Formula: (P*R*T)/100. Output integer part.

starter_codes.python:
p, r, t = map(float, input().split())
print(int((p * r * t) / 100))

problems.title: Celsius to Fahrenheit
problems.description: Convert Celsius to Fahrenheit. F = (C * 9/5) + 32. Output integer part.

starter_codes.python:
c = float(input())
print(int((c * 9/5) + 32))

problems.title: Swap Numbers
problems.description: Swap two numbers without using a third variable.

starter_codes.python:
a, b = map(int, input().split())
a, b = b, a
print(f"{a} {b}")

problems.title: Roots of Quadratic Equation
problems.description: Solve ax^2 + bx + c = 0. Output floor of sum of roots (-b/a).

starter_codes.python:
a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
print(-b // a)

problems.title: Volume of Cylinder
problems.description: Calculate volume of cylinder (PI*r^2*h). r,h are ints. use PI=3.14. Output int.

starter_codes.python:
r, h = map(int, input().split())
print(int(3.14 * r * r * h))

problems.title: Distance Between Points
problems.description: Calculate distance between (x1, y1) and (x2, y2). Output floor value.

starter_codes.python:
import math
x1, y1, x2, y2 = map(int, input().split())
print(int(math.dist((x1, y1), (x2, y2))))

problems.title: Sum of Arithmetic Series
problems.description: Find sum of AP series: a, a+d, a+2d ... up to n terms. formula: n/2 * (2a + (n-1)d)

starter_codes.python:
a, d, n = map(int, input().split())
print((n * (2 * a + (n - 1) * d)) // 2)

problems.title: Sum of Squares
problems.description: Calculate sum of squares of first N natural numbers. Formula: N(N+1)(2N+1)/6.

starter_codes.python:
n = int(input())
print((n * (n + 1) * (2 * n + 1)) // 6)

problems.title: Divisibility by 9
problems.description: Check if a number is divisible by 9. Output 1 if Yes, 0 if No.

starter_codes.python:
n = int(input())
print(1 if n % 9 == 0 else 0)

problems.title: Power of Two
problems.description: Check if N is a power of 2. Output 1/0.

starter_codes.python:
n = int(input())
print(1 if n > 0 and (n & (n - 1) == 0) else 0)

problems.title: Sum of Cubes
problems.description: Calculate sum of cubes of first N natural numbers. Formula: (N(N+1)/2)^2.

starter_codes.python:
n = int(input())
s = (n * (n + 1)) // 2
print(s * s)

problems.title: Triangle Validity
problems.description: Check if 3 sides a,b,c form a valid triangle. (Sum of any 2 > 3rd). Output 1/0.

starter_codes.python:
a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
print(1 if a+b>c and a+c>b and b+c>a else 0)

problems.title: Average of Three
problems.description: Calculate average of 3 numbers. Output integer part.

starter_codes.python:
a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
print((a+b+c)//3)

problems.title: Check Perfect Square
problems.description: Check if N is a perfect square. Output 1/0.

starter_codes.python:
import math
n = int(input())
root = int(math.sqrt(n))
print(1 if root * root == n else 0)

problems.title: Smallest of Three
problems.description: Find the smallest of three numbers.

starter_codes.python: print(min(map(int, input().split())))

problems.title: Cube Volume
problems.description: Calculate volume of a cube with side a.

starter_codes.python:
a = int(input())
print(a**3)

problems.title: Minutes to Seconds
problems.description: Convert minutes to seconds.

starter_codes.python:
m = int(input())
print(m * 60)

problems.title: Hours to Minutes
problems.description: Convert hours to minutes.

starter_codes.python:
h = int(input())
print(h * 60)

problems.title: Days to Hours
problems.description: Convert days to hours.

starter_codes.python:
d = int(input())
print(d * 24)

problems.title: Check Zero
problems.description: Check if a number is zero. Output 1/0.

starter_codes.python:
n = int(input())
print(1 if n == 0 else 0)

problems.title: Check Negative
problems.description: Check if a number is negative. Output 1/0.

starter_codes.python:
n = int(input())
print(1 if n < 0 else 0)

problems.title: Modulus Operator
problems.description: Find remainder of a divided by b.

starter_codes.python:
a, b = map(int, input().split())
print(a % b)

problems.title: Integer Division
problems.description: Find result of integer division of a by b.

starter_codes.python:
a, b = map(int, input().split())
print(a // b)

problems.title: Product of Two
problems.description: Calculate product of two numbers.

starter_codes.python:
a, b = map(int, input().split())
print(a * b)

problems.title: Sum of Evens
problems.description: Calculate sum of all even numbers up to N.

starter_codes.python:
n = int(input())
count = n // 2
print(count * (count + 1))

problems.title: Sum of Odds
problems.description: Calculate sum of all odd numbers up to N (inclusive).

starter_codes.python:
n = int(input())
count = (n + 1) // 2
print(count * count)

problems.title: Square Root Integer
problems.description: Calculate the integer part of the square root of N.

starter_codes.python:
import math
n = int(input())
print(int(math.sqrt(n)))

problems.title: Check Leap Year
problems.description: Check if Y is a leap year (Repeat for practice). Output 1/0.

starter_codes.python:
y = int(input())
print(1 if (y % 4 == 0 and y % 100 != 0) or y % 400 == 0 else 0)

problems.title: Geometric Progression Nth Term
problems.description: Find Nth term of GP given a, r, N. Output integer.

starter_codes.python:
a, r, n = map(int, input().split())
print(a * (r ** (n - 1)))

problems.title: Sum of First N Evens
problems.description: Sum of first N even numbers (2, 4, ...). Formula: N(N+1).

starter_codes.python:
n = int(input())
print(n * (n + 1))

problems.title: Signum Function
problems.description: Implement sign(x): 1 if x>0, -1 if x<0, 0 if x=0.

starter_codes.python:
n = int(input())
print(1 if n > 0 else (-1 if n < 0 else 0))
